data.lyric:
[ti:Memory I Don't Mess With]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:Hey World]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Memory I Don't Mess With - Lee Brice
[00:04.65]Lyrics by：Billy Montana/Brian Davis/Lee Brice
[00:09.30]Composed by：Billy Montana/Brian Davis/Lee Brice
[00:13.95]Red leaves on the river
[00:15.33]
[00:16.51]Footprints in the sand
[00:17.88]
[00:18.91]Cold walk in December
[00:21.01]Warming up your hands
[00:22.62]
[00:24.35]Sun dress on the front steps
[00:26.05]
[00:26.92]Sun up by the lake
[00:28.45]
[00:29.60]Blanket down in the backyard
[00:31.06]
[00:31.59]Lying wide awake
[00:33.06]
[00:34.73]That's a memory I don't mess with
[00:37.79]The girl I was the best with
[00:40.36]The one I was obsessed with
[00:42.34]
[00:42.89]Girl you just don't get it
[00:44.57]
[00:45.39]I'd fall right back with one slip
[00:47.39]
[00:48.02]Always leaves me helpless
[00:50.00]
[00:50.58]Don't hate me I can't help it
[00:53.20]Gotta leave us where we left it
[00:55.90]You're a memory I don't mess with
[00:59.26]
[01:09.02]Moonlight on the back seat
[01:10.72]
[01:11.52]A breeze through the wires
[01:13.12]
[01:14.10]Springsteen on the speakers
[01:15.64]
[01:16.20]Girl I'm on fire
[01:18.13]
[01:18.71]That's stuff I don't think about
[01:20.70]
[01:21.34]'Cause it still kills me now
[01:24.04]I still can't dance around
[01:26.23]
[01:27.23]That memory I don't mess with
[01:30.18]The girl I was the best with
[01:32.14]
[01:32.73]The one I was obsessed with
[01:34.68]
[01:35.28]Girl you just don't get it
[01:37.11]
[01:37.82]I'd fall right back with one slip
[01:39.96]
[01:40.47]Always leaves me helpless
[01:42.42]
[01:42.93]Don't hate me I can't help it
[01:45.65]Gotta leave us where we left it
[01:48.14]You're a memory I don't mess with
[01:52.61]
[02:00.56]It's good running into you like this
[02:05.55]But girl I'm close as I can get
[02:11.05]
[02:11.97]To a memory I don't mess with
[02:14.94]The girl I was the best with
[02:17.39]The one I was obsessed with
[02:19.76]Girl you just don't get it
[02:21.85]
[02:22.42]I'd fall right back with one slip
[02:25.14]Always leaves me helpless
[02:27.44]Don't hate me I can't help it
[02:30.14]Gotta leave us where we left it
[02:32.80]You're a memory I don't mess with
[02:37.24]
[02:46.10]Red leaves on the river
[02:47.50]
[02:48.66]Footprints in the sand
[02:50.13]
[02:51.07]Cold walk in December
[02:53.16]Warming up your hands
data.trans:
[ti:Memory I Don't Mess With]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:Memory I Don't Mess With]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.21]//
[00:18.42]//
[00:27.63]河面有红叶
[00:30.19]沙里有脚印
[00:32.97]寒冬腊月漫步着
[00:34.98]温暖你的手
[00:37.93]穿着太阳裙 走在台阶上
[00:40.59]在湖边晒太阳
[00:43.18]在后院裹着毯子
[00:45.34]清醒地躺着
[00:48.48]那是我无比珍惜的回忆
[00:51.45]那个女孩让我变成最好的自己
[00:53.99]那个女孩让我不能自已
[00:56.47]姑娘 你就是不明白
[00:59.26]我现在很容易沦陷 无法自拔
[01:01.72]总是让我很无助
[01:03.91]不要恨我 我情不自禁
[01:06.91]必须让我们重拾过去
[01:09.51]你是我无比珍惜的回忆
[01:22.63]月光照耀在车后座上
[01:25.33]微风吹拂着电线
[01:27.74]音响里响起Springsteen的声音
[01:29.90]姑娘 我激动不已
[01:32.37]那种事情我根本不会多思考
[01:34.99]因为现在我依然无法抗拒
[01:37.96]我还是不怎么会跳舞
[01:40.87]那是我无比珍惜的回忆
[01:43.79]那个女孩让我变成最好的自己
[01:46.38]那个女孩让我不能自已
[01:48.90]姑娘 你就是不明白
[01:51.57]我现在很容易沦陷 无法自拔
[01:54.28]总是让我很无助
[01:56.63]不要恨我 我情不自禁
[01:59.36]必须让我们重拾过去
[02:02.04]你是我无比珍惜的回忆
[02:13.68]这样向你奔去 感觉很好
[02:18.98]但是姑娘 我已经无比靠近
[02:25.59]我无比珍惜的回忆
[02:28.66]那个女孩让我变成最好的自己
[02:31.01]那个女孩让我不能自已
[02:33.46]姑娘 你就是不明白
[02:36.15]我现在很容易沦陷 无法自拔
[02:38.73]总是让我很无助
[02:40.68]不要恨我 我情不自禁
[02:43.84]必须让我们重拾过去
[02:46.49]你是我无比珍惜的回忆
[02:59.68]河面有红叶
[03:02.15]沙里有脚印
[03:04.84]寒冬腊月漫步着
[03:07.16]温暖你的手
